name: Kupka, František
item_t: Frank Kupka : Pioneer of Abstract Art.
public_note: A monograph cum catalogue, frequently used as a reference for the work of the artist. The  Czech edition was published by Odeon in the same year. The lengthy introductory texts contain much critical information. The catalogue itself is organized by thematic cycles, and includes gouaches and pastels.

name: Kuma, Kengo
item_t: Kengo Kuma : Complete Works.
public_note: This is basically a photographic monograph on Kuma's architectural work, with project illustrations and plans. The work is defined and divided by three themes: water & glass; wood, grass & bamboo; and stone earth & ceramic.  The publication includes some commentary by the architect.

name: Kulmbach, Hans von
item_t: Die Zeichnungen Hans Süss von Kulmbachs und Hans Leonhard Schäufeleins.
author: Winkler, Friedrich
public_note:
This is a monographic study the artists' drawings, with an appendix of copies and falsely attributed works.

Drawings attributed to Hans Süss von Kulmbach are arranged according to type and function of the drawing (ie. Designs for altars etc.). Works by Schäufelein are organized by period.

name: Kuba, Ludvík
item_t: Ludvík Kuba malir.
author_s:
Micko, Miroslav                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Nezval, Vitezslav                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Seifert, Jaroslav                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Stech, V.V.
public_note: The study includes a poem, preface, essays on the artist's life and work, lists of biographical dates, list of art works, musical and literary works, resumé, index of pictures, and supplement.

name: Kuma, Kengo
item_t: Kengo Kuma : Complete Works.
author: Frampton, Kenneth
public_note: This is an updated edition of the monograph originally published in 2013 (see entry in this database).  The 2018 edition lists 30 projects, including five new projects not cited in the earlier publication.  These are: China Academy of Art's Folk Art Museum; the V&A Dundee; the Komatsu Seiren Fabric Laboratory fa-bo, Under One Roof Project for EPFL ArtLab, and Japan House Sao Paolo.

name: Kupka, František
item_t: Frantisek Kupka : catalogue raisonné des huiles = Catalogue Raisonné of Oil Paintings = Soupis olejomaleb.
author_s:
Lekes, Vladimir                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Husslein-Arco, Agnes                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Lekes, Ludmila                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Zlatohlávková, Eliska
imprint: Prague : Adolf Loos Apartment and Gallery ; London : Cologne : König Buchhandlung, 2016.
public_note: Developed with the cooperation of the National Gallery in Prague, the Adolf Loos Apartment and Gallery in Prague and the Austrian National Gallery Belvedere in Vienna.

name: Kruseman, Fredrik Marinu
item_t: Fredrik Marinus Kruseman, 1816-1882 : Painter of Pleasing Landscapes : A Biography with a Catalogue Raisonné.
author_s:
Heteren, Marjan van                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            de Meere, Jan                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            de Boat, Saskia (Preface)
imprint: Schiedam, The Netherlands : Scriptum Art Publishers, 1998.
public_note: Includes a list of paintings compiled by the artist himself, plus auction results for the period 1946-1997.  The catalogue raisonné lists c.300-350 works, plus an unidentified number of drawings. Due to complexities, the completeness of the catalogue is not guaranteed, nor were the authors able to identify all previous owners or see all works in the original.

name: Krol, Abram
item_t: Catalogue raisonné de l'oeuvre gravé de Abram Krol.
author: Cailler, Pierre
public_note: This is volume 9 in the series "Catalogues d'oeuvres gravés et lithographiés."  This volume is subtitled: Tome I - 1948-1957, it covers the engraved and lithographic work.

name: Krone, Hermann
item_t: Hermann Krone : die Photographien ; Werkverzeichnis.
author: Lehmann, Hans-Ulrich
imprint: Dresden : Kuperstich-Kabinett, Staatliche Kunstsammlungen Dresden ; Munich : Deutscher Kunstverlag, 2008
illustrations: c. 3,802 b&w, 37 color ills.; 32 color plates
public_note:
First complete catalogue of over 3,800 of Krone's photographs; all works are illustrated.  
Entries are arranged by medium and then by genre. Individual entries include inscriptions and some comments.

name: Krol, Abram
item_t: Abram Krol : Livres, suites, estampes : gravés au burin, 1958-1978.
public_note:
Continues Pierre Cailler's 1969 catalogue. The catalogue is organized by series, and mostly consists of illustrations.

Only basic information is provided as to catalogue number, titles, publisher, edition, date, and dimensions.

name: Krischanitz, Adolf
item_t: Adolf Krischanitz : das Inventar ist das Ergebnis der Inventur = An Inventory of Invention.
author_s:
Köb, Edelbert (ed.)                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Hackenschmidt, Sebastian                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Kapfinger, Otto                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Meili, Marcel                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Krischanitz, Adolf
public_note: The publication includes a contribution by the artist. There are parallel German/English texts. The catalogue raisonné serves as the comprehensive inventory of Krischanitz's interior design

name: Kriester, Raine
item_t: Rainer Kriester : Köpfe und Stelen : das plastische Werk, 1970-1996 : Anthologie, Werkverzeichnis.
public_note: There is an introductory essay, a catalogue of work, and appendices containing biographical and bibliographical information, including references to documentary films and electronic media, plus source citations.

name: Krimmel, John Lew
item_t: John Lewis Krimmel : An Artist in Federal America.
author: Naeve, Milo M.
imprint: Newark, DE : University of Delaware Press ; London : Associated University Presses, 1987.
public_note: The catalogue contains essays on the artist in Europe and America, America's approach to art, and American taste.  It is organized by medium: oil paintings, oil sketches, watercolors and drawings, prints (known and unknown), and sketch books.

name: Krinner, Michaela
item_t: Michaela Krinner : Weg einer Kokoschka Schülerin : Werkverzeichnis = Catalogue Raisonné.
author: Ludwig, Horst

name: Krieghoff, Corneliu
item_t: Cornelius Krieghoff : Pioneer Painter of North America.
author: Barbeau, Marius
imprint: Toronto : Macmillian Company of Canada, Ltd., 1934
ind_entr_cont: There is a chronological list of dated pictures, plus a catalogue raisonné of the paintings. The individual entires include dimensions, provenance, short descriptions and commentary, and signature and inscription information.

name: Krasner, Lee
item_t: Lee Krasner : A Catalogue Raisonné.
author_s:
Landau, Ellen G.                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Grove, Jeffrey D.                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Thaw, Eugene (preface)
imprint: New York : Harry N. Abrams, Inc., 1995.
public_note: This is a complete catalogue of Krasner's paintings, works on paper, and mosaics, arranged chronologically. Several previously unknown works were added to the catalogue after its completion. These are inserted according to their chronological placement, and are identified with a lower case letter after the entry number.

name: Krasner, Lee
item_t: Lee Krasner : The Umber Paintings 1959-1962.
public_note: The chronological catalogue lists materials, dimensions, provenance, exhibition history, and literature.

name: Kreienbühl, Jürg
item_t: Jürg Kreienbuhl : catalogue raisonné de l'oeuvre gravé et lithographié 1952-1997 : das graphische Gesamtwerk 1952-1997.
author: Plumart, Roland
public_note: Catalogue raisonné published in conjunction with the catalogue of an exhibition held at the Musée de Gravelines.

name: Koulermos, Pano
item_t: Panos Koulermos : opera completa.
imprint: Mendrisio : Accademia di architettura dell'Università della Svizzera italiana, 2004.
public_note: The catalogue raisonné was published on the occasion of a circulating exhibition held at Mendrisio, Nicosia, and Athens, 2004-2006.

name: Kounellis, Jann
item_t: Jannis Kounellis : Editions, 1972-1990.
imprint: Munich : Editions Schellmann at Schirmer/Mosel Verlag, 1992.

name: Kornberger, Alfred
item_t: Werkverzeichnis Alfred Kornberger [online].
cronology: The online edition is updated with recent discoveries and addenda to previous entries.  The oil paintings are arranged in chronological order with the catalogue image giving number, title, medium and support, date, dimensions, and signature information.  There is also some provenance (with publication references), and current location if known.
ind_entr_cont: This website was organized under the aegis of Galerie Artziwna, Vienna (2016-2018).  This is based on the 2007 catalogue compiled by Gerald and Monika Ziwna in conjunction with Franz Smola  (see entry in this database).

name: Købke, Christen
item_t: Christen Købke : Catalogue Raisonné.
author: Nørregård-Nielsen, Hans Edvard
public_note: This study of the artist's work is organized by locations where he worked. The critical essays are contained in v. 1- v.2.

name: Kretzschmar, Bernhard
item_t: Bernhard Kretzschmar : Werkverzeichnis der Druckgraphik 1914-1969.
author_s:
Schmidt, Gudrun                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Werner, Klaus                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Löffler, Fritz (Intro)
imprint: Berlin : Galerie Arkade Staatlicher Kunsthandel der DDR, 1981.

name: Krop, Hildo
item_t: Hildo Krop : beeldhouwer.
author: Lagerweij-Polak, E.J.
imprint: The Hague : SDU ; Amsterdam : Openbaar Kunstbezit, 1992.
public_note: This is a study of the Dutch sculptor who specialized in many decorative architectural programs. In addition to the catalogue raisonné, the publication contains a foreword and essays on the work by period. Texts are in Dutch with English summaries.

name: ccardi, Carla
item_t: Carla Accardi : la vita delle forme / The Life of Forms [catalogo ragionato].
author: Celant, Germano
imprint: Cinisello Balsamo, Milan : Silvana ; Rome : Zerynthia, 2011.
public_note: Catalogue raisonné of all of the artist's works produced from 1996-2010. The chronology was compiled by Diletta Borromeo, the Archivio Accardi, and Francesco Impellizzeri.

name: dam, Otto
item_t: Der Maler Otto Adam (1901-1973) : Leben und Werk : Monographie.
author: Platen, Amelie-Claire von

name: Korn, Marian
item_t: The Prints of Marian Korn : A Catalogue Raisonné.
author_s:
Richie, Donald                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Yanai, Tsuguo                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Oliver Statler (Intro)
imprint: New York, NY : John Weatherhill Inc. for Graphics Editions, 1988.
public_note: The catalogue includes notes on Korn's printing technique.

name: Kornberger, Alfred
item_t: Alfred Kornberger, 1933-2002 : der Akt als Innovation / Franz Smola ; mit einem Vorwort von Dieter Schrage und einem Werkverzeichnis der Gemälde von Monika und Gerald Ziwna.
author_s:
Kornberger, Alfred                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Ziwna, Monika                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Smola, Franz                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Ziwna, Gerald
public_note: This study includes a foreword, essays on the artist's life and work, plates, a catalogue of the oil paintings, a list of solo and group exhibitions, and a list of commissioned and acquired works. There is also a biography and an English summary.  (See also the updated online catalogue raisonné cited in this database.)

name: Konti, Isidore
item_t: The Sculpture of Isidore Konti : 1862-1938.
author_s:
Hudson River Museum                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Halley, Jr., Donald (Intro)                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Smith Madigan, Mary Jean
imprint: Yonkers : The Hudson River Museum Publishers, 1974.
public_note: Catalogue of an exhibition held at the Hudson River Museum, it includes a catalogue raisonné of all 119 of the artist's sculptures. Works are illustrated with black and white photos, when available.

name: Koons, Jeff
item_t: Jeff Koons.
author_s:
Holzwarth, Hans Werner (ed.)                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Siegel, Katy                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Sischy, Ingrid                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Schneider, Eckerd
public_note: The publication includes a biography of Koons and essays on his artistic career and the critical reception of his work.  The catalogue includes statements by the artist.

name: Kolig, Anton
item_t: Anton Kolig 1886-1950 : das malerische Werk.
author: Rychilk, Otmar
public_note:
Following introductory essays on Kolig's life and work is the catalogue raisonné of the paintings. There are appendices with photographs of the studio and exhibitions, a synopsis of earlier publications on the artist, a bibliography, and a name index.

The chronological catalogue raisonné of the paintings, colored works on paper and monumental works follows the numbering established by the earlier catalogue published by Galerie Welz in 1948.

name: Kollwitz, Käthe
item_t: The Graphic Work of Käthe Kollwitz. Complete Illustrated Catalogue .
author: Klipstein, Dr. August
public_note:
This is a catalogue raisonnè of the artist's lithographs, etchings and woodcuts. The American edition (with English title page) of "Käthe Kollwitz, Verzeichnis der graphischen Werkes…" published by Klipstein und Co., Bern, 1955. The 1955 edition  was also reprinted by Maurizio Martino Fine Arts (Mansfield Center, CT, 1996). For another, more recent, related publication, see A. Knesebeck: "Käthe Kollwitz : Werkverzeichnis der Graphik…" (cited in this database).

"The section of the book covering the years 1890-1912 is based on the descriptive catalogue by Professor Johannes Sievers, published in 1913."

name: Kollwitz, Käthe
item_t: Käthe Kollwitz : die Handzeichnungen.
author_s:
Nagel, Otto                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Schallenberg-Nagel, Sibylle                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Köllwitz, Dr. Hans                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Timm, Dr. Werner
public_note: An American edition was also published under the title: "The Drawings of Käthe Kollwitz," New York, 1972 (only the title page is in English, the text and catalogue are in German).

name: Kokoschka, Oska
item_t: Handzeichungen : fünfter Band.
public_note: Issued in an edition of 650 numbered copies. This volume includes works up until 1976 and has cross references to Hans Maria Wingler's "Das Werk des Malers," (1956) and Winkler/Welz's "Oskar Kokoschka, Das druckgraphische Werk," (1975).

name: Kokoschka, Oska
item_t: Handzeichnungen, 1906-1969.
author_s:
Rathenau, Ernest                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Kokoshka, Oskar                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Heise, Carl (foreword)
public_note: Issued in an edition of 600 numbered copies, this volume contains an introduction by Carl Georg Heise, and a foreword by Ernest Rathenau.

name: Koerner, Ernest Carl Eugen
item_t: Ernst Koerner : ein Berliner Orientmaler des 19. Jahrhunderts : mit Werkverzeichnis und Themenliste seiner Gemälde.
author: Kosack, Wolfgang
public_note: In addition to the catalogue raisonné, the publication includes biographical data and various essays on the artist, including a section on his signatures.  Appendices include sections on literature on the artist, as well as his letters and travel notebooks.  There is also an annotated chronological list of pictures by year.

name: Kohler, Alfred
item_t: Alfred Kohler, 1916-1984 : meisterhafte Aquarelle : Werkverzeichnis.
author: Klinger, Dominik M.
public_note: The introductory essay on the artist is included in German, English and French. The chronology and the catalogue of works, however, is only in German.

name: Kokoschka, Oska
item_t: Handzeichnungen, 1906-1965.

name: Kokoschka, Oska
item_t: Oskar Kokoschka. The Paintings Online.
author_s:
Erling, Katharina                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Feilchenfeldt, Walter                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Staub, Sabine Kaufmann
cronology: The catalogue offers a trilingual guide on its usage.
public_note: Works are arranged chronologically, but can be arranged alphabetically. Entries include catalogue number, title (mostly in German, foreign languages are listed in an "Other titles" field), date, marks/labels & inscriptions, dimensions, provenance, exhibitions, and references.

name: Kokoschka, Oska
item_t: Der Zeichner Kokoschka.
author_s:
Rathenau, Ernest                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Westheim, Paul (foreword)                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Kokoschka, Oskar
imprint: New York : E. Rathenau [Auslieferung E. Hauswedell, Hamburg, 1961].
public_note: Issued in an edition of 500 copies.

name: Koenig, Fritz
item_t: Fritz Koenig : Werkverzeichnis.
illustrations: 221 b&w, + 232 color pl. (v.1); b&w, some color (v.2)
public_note: The first volume covers the drawings, and includes a foreword, essays, appendices with biography, a list of exhibitions, bibliography, and supplements. The critical catalogue has number, title, dimensions, signature and marks, collection and literary information, but no comments.

name: Kokoschka, Oska
item_t: Handzeichnungen.

name: Kokoschka, Oska
item_t: Oskar Kokoschka : The Work of the Painter.
author: Wingler, Hans Maria
public_note:
The original edition in German was published by Galerie Welz (Salzburg, 1958). This early monographic study covers the artist's work up to June 1956. The first part of the book considers the paintings (n. 1-394), the second part sculpture and other works, the third part is other works by the artist. 
Also see the more recent publication by Winkler & Erling: "Oskar Kokoschka die Gemälde," 1995 (cited in this database).

name: Kokoschka, Oska
item_t: Oskar Kokoschka die Gemälde, 1906-1928.
public_note: Originally scheduled to be published in three volumes, but only volume 1 has appeared to date.  A new online catalogue raisonné of the paintings, which will update Volume 1 of the Winkler and Erling catalogue raisonné, is scheduled to launch in 2017. This project is being compiled under the direction of Katharina Erling and Walter Feilchenfeldt.

name: Kokoschka, Oska
item_t: Oskar Kokoschka : das druckgraphische Werk.
public_note: Following introductory essays, the catalogue raisonné section is organized by subject matter. The catalogue gives number, title, date, medium and color, marks, dimensions, paper, edition (with comments), printer, and publisher. There are comparison lists with Arntz and Welz catalogue numbers, and a systematic index of prints after pictorial themes.

name: Kokoschka, Oska
item_t: Oskar Kokoschka : die Zeichnungen und Aquarelle 1897-1916.
public_note:
Issued under the aegis of the Albertina, Vienna and Oskar Kokoschka-Dokumentation, Pöchlarn.   The catalogue raisonné is projected to be completed in four volumes.   

The first volume of the catalogue lists 889 drawings and watercolors by the artist.

name: Kolbe, Georg
item_t: Georg Kolbe, Leben und Werk ; mit dem Katalog-Plastiken im Georg-Kolbe-Museum.
author: Berger, Ursel
public_note: Following a foreword and essays on the artist's work by decade (with cross references to catalogue numbers and plates), there are appendices with a chronology, a list of one-man exhibitions, and text sources. There are also indices covering the literature, proper names and photo sources.

name: Kolbe, Georg
item_t: Georg Kolbe : das druckgraphische Werk.
author: Rosenbach, Detlev
imprint: Berlin : Edition Rosenbach Hannover im Gebr. Mann Verlag, 1997.

name: Kollwitz, Käthe
item_t: Käthe Kollwitz : Werkverzeichnis der Graphik; Neubearbeitung des Verzeichnis von August Klipstein, publiziert 1955.
author: Knesebeck, Alexandra von dem
public_note: The CD contains an English translation.

name: Koninck, Philips de
item_t: Philips Koninck : en Beitrag zur Erforschung der holländischen Malerei des XVII. Jahrhunderts : mit vollständigem Oeuvrekatalog.
author: Gerson, Horst
public_note:
This is an unrevised second edition; the "Oeuvrekatalog" was originally issued as the author's doctoral thesis at the University of Göttigen.

After the introduction and a biography of the artist, there are sections on the landscape paintings, figure studies, drawings and etchings; documentary evidence is provided.

name: Kollwitz, Käthe
item_t: Käthe Kollwitz : die Plastik : Werkverzeichnis.
author_s:
Seeler, Annette                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Käthe Kollwitz Museum Köln (ed.)                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Kreissparkasse Köln (ed.)

name: cht, René Charle
item_t: René Acht : Monographie und Werkverzeichnis.
public_note: This is the catalogue of an exhibition held at the Augustinermuseum (Freiburg im Breisgau, Germany); Galerie Schwarzes Kloster (Freiburg im Breisgau); and the Museum zu Allerheiligen (Schaffhausen, Switzerland).

name: Koekkoek, Barend Cornel
item_t: Barend Cornelis Koekkoek 1803-1862 : ein Landschaftsmaler der niederländischen Romantik.
author: Nollert, Angelika
imprint: Frankfurt am Main ; New York : P. Lang, 2000.
public_note:
The present publication was originally presented as the author's doctoral thesis at the Universität Münster in 1997.

Following an introduction, there are sections covering the artist's life from his early academy days to the end of his career in Cleves.
The publication includes essays on Koekkoek's subjects discussed by decade, as well as his oil studies and drawings, also listed chronologically.

Appendices cover biographical data and source documentation. There is a bibliography and plate index.

name: Kocherscheidt, Ku
item_t: Kurt Kocherscheidt : Catalogue Raisonné : Paintings and Wood Sculptures 1966-1992.
public_note: This book catalogues approximately 500 of Kocherscheidt's paintings and all of his works in wood, from 1986 until his death in 1992.

name: Koch, Pyke
item_t: Pyke Koch : schilderijen en tekeningen =  Paintings and Drawings.
author_s:
Koch, Pyke                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Schoon, Talitha                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Kickern, Dory (c.r.)                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Schampers, Karel                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Blotkamp, Carel (c.r.)
public_note:
Published on the occasion of an exhibition held at the Museum Boymans- van Beuningen in 1995.  The present study is a revised and supplemented update of an Blatkamp's 1972 publication.

The publication covers Koch's paintings, commercial designs, stage sets, stamps, ex libris designs, and works known only from photographs. It includes essays and a biographical sketch of the artist, plus a catalogue raisonné, a list of exhibitions in chronological order, critical reviews, and a bibliography.

name: Koch, Joseph Anton
item_t: Joseph Anton Koch, 1768-1839, mit Werkverzeichnis und Briefen des Künstlers.
author: Lutterotti, Otto R. von
public_note: Catalogue raisonné lists 94 authentic paintings and 1,013 drawings. Contains separate catalogues of lost paintings and copies and erroneous attributions, arranged chronologically.

name: Koch, Joseph Anton
item_t: Joseph Anton Koch, 1768-1839 : Leben und Werk : mit einem vollständigen Werkverzeichnis.
author: Lutterotti, Otto R. von

name: Koch, Diethelm
item_t: Diethelm Koch : Bildhauer des Konkreten : Werkverzeichnis.
public_note: Volume 2 catalogues Koch's last output, including works found in the artist's studio at the time of his death (all work is from 2006); the publication was issued in tandem with posthumous exhibitions of the artist's work.

name: Kobell, Wilhelm von
item_t: Wilhelm von Kobell ; Monographie und kritischen Verzeichnis der Werke.
author_s:
Wichmann, Siegfried                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Bauer, Heinz                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Gierl, Irmgard                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Wrede, Rotraud
public_note: From the series "Münchner Forschungen zur Kunstgeschichte." The catalogue raisonné is arranged thematically and then chronologically. The catalogue covers Kobell's oil paintings, watercolors, and drawings, but not his printed works.

name: Kobell, Wilhelm von
item_t: Wilhelm von Kobell : Druckgraphik : Studien zur Radierung and Aquatinta mit kritischem Verzeichnis.
public_note: The catalogue raisonné of the etchings and aquatints is arranged chronologically.

name: Knüpfer, Nikolau
item_t: Nicolaus Knupfer, an Original Artist : Monograph and Catalogue Raisonné of Paintings and Drawings.
author: Saxton, Jo
public_note: This is the first full monograph published on the artist. There is a detailed catalogue of 304 works, including drawings, examined in terms of provenance, literature, and attribution.

name: Knubben, Jürgen
item_t: Jürgen Knubben : Werkverzeichnis der Skulpturen 1973-2017.
author: Apt-Straubinger, Karin (ed.)

name: Knights, Winifred Margare
item_t: Winifred Knights, 1899-1947.
author: Llewellyn, Sacha
imprint: London : Lund Humphries : Dulwich Picture Gallery, 2016.
public_note: Published on the occasion of the retrospective exhibition "Winifred Knights" at the Dulwich Picture Gallery. The catalogue raisonné lists all of her major paintings, along with their respective preparatory studies.

name: Knoller, Martin
item_t: Martin Knoller, 1725-1804 : Malerei zwischen Spätbarock und Klassizismus in Österreich, Italien und Süddeutschland.
author: Baumgartl, Edgard
public_note:
In addition to the catalogue raisonné, this study contains a foreword and a biography of the artist, plus chapters on the work: frescoes, altarpieces, portraits, historical and allegorical paintings, landscapes, oil sketches, drawings, etc.

There are listings of sources and documents, plus appendices with life dates, bibliographical abbreviations, and indices.

name: Koch, Diethelm
item_t: Diethelm Koch : Bildhauer des Konkreten : Werkverzeichnis 1966-2005.
author: Decker, Marlene (editor)
public_note:
Catalogue raisonné of the artist's oeuvre, arranged  by decade. The publication includes texts written by Maria Engels, Christmut Präger, Marina von Assel, et al.

A supplement published in 2008 includes all of the works produced after the publication of Vol. 1 until the artist's death in 2006 (see entry cited in this database).

name: Knight, Laura, Dame
item_t: The Graphic Work of Laura Knight : Including a Catalogue Raisonné of her Prints.
author_s:
Bolling, G. Fredric                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Withington, Valerie A.                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Grose, Irving (Iforeword)
imprint: Aldershot, Hants, England : Scolar Press ; Brookfield, VT : Ashgate Publishers, 1993.
public_note: Introductory sections includes a preface, illustrations of the work, and discussions on the linocuts, woodcuts and lithographs. This section is followed by the catalogue.

name: Klusemann, Georg
item_t: Georg Klusemann, 1942-1981. Monographie und Werkverzeichnis.
author_s:
Schmidt, Hans M.                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Burmeister, Joachim                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Fangrat, Heike                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Hochman Klusemann, Elena
public_note: The publication is presented in collaboration with the Landschaftsverbands Rheinland and the Rheinisches Landesmuseum Bonn. The catalogue raisonné includes all of the artist's paintings, works on paper, drawings, graphic works, murals, illustrated books, sculptures and other objects, and stage designs.

name: Kluge, Gustav
item_t: Gustav Kluge : Druckstöcke, 1984-2018.
public_note: This is the catalogue of the exhibition "Rote Watte. Druckstöcke und Holzdrücke von Gustav Kluge" held at the Horst-Janssen-Museum Oldenburg; Kunstmuseum Reutlingen; Museum Lothar Fischer Neumarkt i. d. OPf. The exhibition featured the artist's printing blocks and wood block prints.

name: Klotz, Siegfried
item_t: Siegfried Klotz, 1939-2004 : Werkverzeichnis.
author_s:
Weber, Stephen (ed.)                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Rehberg, Karl-Siegbert                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Beck, Rainer                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Frommhold, Erhard

name: Kloss, Gene
item_t: Gene Kloss : An American Printmaker, a Raisonné.
author_s:
Sanchez, A. Eugene                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Armstrong, John E.                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Hulbert, Dory                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Mertz, Joan M.
public_note: Catalogue raisonné of 627 prints and sketches by the artist. Publication also contains excerpts of Kloss's correspondence with her dealer, Mary Sanchez.

name: Klippel, Robe
item_t: Robert Klippel.
imprint: Sydney : Art Gallery of New South Wales, 2002.
public_note:
Published on the occasion of an exhibition at the Art Gallery of New South Wales, 2002.
The hard back edition of this publication contains a CD-ROM with the title: "Robert Klippel : Catalogue Raisonné of Sculpture."

name: Klinger, Max
item_t: Max Klinger : Etchings, Engravings and Lithographs, 1878-1903.
author: Singer, Hans Wolfgang
imprint: San Francisco : Alan Wofsy Fine Arts, 1991.

name: Klimt, Gustav
item_t: Gustav Klimt with a Catalogue Raisonné of His Paintings.
imprint: New York : Frederick A. Praeger Publishers, 1968.
public_note:
The German language edition was first published by Verlag Galerie Welz, Salzburg.
A British edition was also published by Thames & Hudson, London, 1968.  At the time of publication, this study comprised all of Klimt's known paintings in chronological order as well as several watercolors and pastels that are considered "finished" paintings. Individual entries also contain information on sketches for the finished paintings.

name: Klingelhöller, Harald
item_t: Harald Klingelhöller : alle Metaphern werden wahr : Skulpturen 1986-1997 = All Metaphors Become True : Sculptures 1986-1997.
author_s:
Wilmes, Ulrich                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Friedel, Helmut                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Loock, Ulrich                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Tarantino, Michael
public_note: This is the catalogue of an exhibition held at the Lenbachhaus Kunstbau München.  The publication includes an illustrated checklist of all sculptures created from 1979 to 1997.

name: Klimt, Gustav
item_t: Tout l'oeuvre peint de Klimt.
public_note: From the series "Les Classiques de l'art".  There is an introduction, followed by a section on the artist's critical fortunes, a list of illustrations, color plates, catalogue of the work, plus chronological and iconographical lists of all Klimt's paintings or those attributed to him. There are title, subject and locations indices.

name: Klimt, Gustav
item_t: Gustav Klimt : die Zeichnungen.
public_note: A second supplementary volume was issued under the direction of Marian Bisanz-Prakken, a curator in the Graphic Art Collection of the Albertina, Vienna. Dr. Bisanz-Prakkern  assisted Alice Strobl on the preparation of all the earlier volumes.

name: Klimt, Gustav
item_t: Gustav Klimt : das graphisches Werk.
author: Metzger, Rainer

name: Klimt, Gustav
item_t: L'opera completa di Klimt.
public_note: From the series "Classici dell'arte."

name: Klimt, Gustav
item_t: Gustav Klimt.
author_s:
Weidinger, Alfred                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Strobl, Alice                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Partsch, Susanna et al.
public_note:
The original version of the catalogue was also published in a German language edition in 2007. The catalogue raisonné lists 253 authentic paintings, including the frescoes. The commentary takes into account the recent scholarship on the artist's oeuvre. It does not include a concordance to the earlier standard reference on Klimt's work by Novotny and Dobai (cited in this database), however, requiring that both works be consulted in tandem. 

(n.b. The French translation published in 2008 by Citadelles & Mazenod, and the English translations issued after 2008, contain a correction to cat. no. 176 "Blooming Meadow".)

name: Klimt, Gustav
item_t: Gustav Klimt : In Search of the "Total Artwork".
public_note: This is an exhibition catalogue which was issued under the aegis of the Oesterreichische Galerie Belvedere, Vienna, and the Hangaram Art Museum, Seoul Arts Center, South Korea, 2009.

name: Klimt, Gustav
item_t: Gustac Klimt : Drawings = Zeichnungen.
author_s:
Bisanz-Prakken, Marian                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Kohlbacher, Eberhard                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Wienerroither, Alois
public_note: In addition to the catalogue, there is a biography of the artist,

name: Klengel, Johann Christian
item_t: "Glücklich gewähite Natur --" : der Dresdner Landschaftsmaler Johann Christian Klengel (1751-1824) :  Monographie und Werkverzeichnis der Gemälde, Zeichnungen, Radierungen und Lithographien.
author: Frölich, Anke
public_note:
This study contains a foreword with various chapters with critical commentary on the artist's production, technique, etc. These are followed by a section containing a catalogue raisonné of paintings and oil sketches (organized by subject), lost works are included.

The appendices include a list of abbreviations, a bibliography, genealogy of the artist's family, and indices of names, locations, and collections housing the artist's works.

name: Kleint, Boris Herbe
item_t: Boris Kleint.
author_s:
Dittmann, Lorenz                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Jähne, Michael                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Zimmermann, Reinhard
imprint: Saarbrucken : St. Johann ; Saarlouis : Institut für aktuelle Kunst im Saarland an der Hochschule für Bildende Künste, 2003.
public_note: A catalogue of the drawings, watercolors, gouaches, and colored sketches.

name: Klein, Yve
item_t: Yves Klein.
author_s:
Wember, Paul                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Fiedler, Gisela                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Institut für moderne Kunst Nürnberg (ed.)
public_note:
The secondary title is "Werkverzeichnis, Biographie, Bibliographie, Ausstellungsverzeichnis."

This is a catalogue raisonné of the paintings, sculptures, reliefs, and drawings. There are essays on Klein's use of color, pigments, and his artistic legacy.

name: Kleinheinz, Friedrich
item_t: Friedrich Kleinheinz : Bildwerke einseitig- doppelseitig : 1960-1993, 1993-2012.
author_s:
Kunstmuseum Heidenheim                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Eberlein, Joseph Konrad                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Herbst, Helmut                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Hirner, René                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Oberndorfer, Gisela

name: Klenze, Leo von
item_t: Leo von Klenze : Leben, Werk, Vision.
author: Buttlar, Adrian von
public_note: A revised updated edition appeared in 2014: "Leo von Klenze : Leben, Werk, Vision", 2. Auflage (Munich, C.H. Beck, 2014) v. publication listed in this database.

name: Klein, Yve
item_t: Yves Klein : Catalogue of Editions and Sculptures.
public_note: The author claims this to be a guide to the production of the artist's multiples and a meticulous catalogue of the editions. It aims to clarify the posthumous editions and their relationships to the original works.

name: Klee, Paul
item_t: Paul Klee Handzeichnungen.
author_s:
Glaesemer, Jürgen                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Baumgartner, Marcel (v 3)                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Scholler, Marie-Louise (v 3)                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Kunsthmuseum Bern
illustrations: v.1: 257, some color; v.2: 690, mostly color; v. 3: 776 mostly b&w ills.
public_note: Published in the series: Sammlungskataloge des Berner Kunstmuseums. The catalogue is divided into three chronological periods of the artist's career, each with its own catalogue.

name: Kjærholm, Poul
item_t: The Furniture of Poul Kjærholm : Catalogue Raisonné.
imprint: New York : G. R. Miller & Co. in assoc. with R Gallery and Sean Kelly Gallery, 2007.
public_note: This catalogue raisonné was created to list all the designer's full scale projects (whether model prototypes or series productions), but excludes designs or concepts that exist only as drawings or small scale models.

name: Klimt, Gustav
item_t: Gustav Klimt : The Complete Paintings.
author_s:
Natter, Tobias G. (ed. & c.r.)                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Taschen, Benedikt (dir. & prod.)
public_note:
This catalogue reproduces all of the artist's known correspondence, excerpts from his writings, and other archival documents related to Klimt's life and work, including critical reviews by Klimt's contemporaries. A German edition was issued simultaneously.

The catalogue raisonné presents approximately 245 paintings with the most current information available; including several early works not covered in the three previous oeuvre catalogues of the artist's work (Novoty & Dobai, 1967-1968-1975 and Weidinger, 2007- see entries cited in this database). However, the present study does not consider works on paper.

name: Klee, Paul
item_t: Paul Klee : Catalogue Raisonné.
author_s:
Paul Klee Foundation/Kunst Museum Bern (Editors)                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Helfenstein, Josef (Managing Ed., V.1-9.)                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Rümelin, Christian (Managing Ed, V. 1-9)                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Wiederkehr Sladeczek, Eva (Managing Ed.,  V.7-8)
public_note:
A German edition was published by Bentelli Verlag: Bern, Switzerland for the Paul Klee Foundation. 

The catalogue is illustrated with b&w thumbnail images.  All color plates are in volume 9.

name: Kitaj, R.B.
item_t: The Prints of R.B. Kitaj.
author: Kinsman, Jane
imprint: Aldershot, Hants, England : Scolar Press; Brookfield, VT : Ashgate Publishing Company, 1994.
public_note: Published in conjunction with an exhibition at the National Gallery of Australia. The publication contains a catalogue of the artist's prints from 1958-1993.

name: Klinger, Max
item_t: Max Klinger das Graphische Werk, 1909-1919 / The Graphic Work 1909-1919.
author_s:
Beyer, Carl                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Singer, Hans W.                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Friedländer, Max                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Elias, Julius
imprint: San Francisco : Alan Wofsy Fine Arts, 1997.
public_note:
A reprint of 1930 German catalogue published by P.H. Beyer & Son: "Max Klingers graphisches Werk von 1909-bis 1919; eine vorläufige Zusammenstellung in Anschluss an den Oeuvre-Katalog von Hans W Singer." The 1930 publication is a continuation of Hans W. Singer's 1909 book 'Max Klinger's Etchings, Engravings, and Lithographs', which was based primarily on the holdings of the Graphic Arts Cabinet in the Leipzig Museum and, to a lesser extent, on works in the Klinger House and other public and private collections.

The translation reprint is in English, with additional entries.

name: Kitaj, R.B.
item_t: Kitaj Prints : A Catalogue Raisonné.
author: Ramkalawon, Jennifer
public_note: The publication accompanies an exhibition of Kitaj's prints held at the British Museum, which holds an almost complete set of the artist's proofs.  The texts include a biography of the artist.

name: Klee, Paul
item_t: Verzeichnis des graphischen Werkes von Paul Klee.
author_s:
Kornfeld, Eberhard W.                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Kaehr, Yvonne E.                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Stauffer, Christine E.
public_note:
This second, corrected, supplemented and expanded edition replaces the long out-of-print 1963 Kornfeld and Klipstein publication. The catalogue considers Klee's letters and diaries.
See also the chronologically organized "Paul Klee Catalogue Raisonné" (9 v.) cited in the database, which includes prints as well.

name: Kleinholz, Frank
item_t: Kleinholz Graphics : Catalogue Raisonné, 1940-1975.
imprint: Coral Gables : University of Miami Press; New York : Associated American Artists, 1975.

name: Klapheck, Konrad
item_t: Konrad Klapheck : das graphische Werk.
public_note: Published to accompany an exhibition held on the occasion of the artist's 80th birthday, at Kunstfoyer, Versicherungskammer Kulturstiftung, Munich. 2015,

name: Klenze, Leo von
item_t: Leo von Klenze : Architekt zwischen Kunst und Hof, 1784-1864.
author_s:
Nerdinger, Winfried                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Hildebrand, Sonja                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Steiner, Ulrike                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Weidner, Thomas
public_note:
The catalogue raisonné accompanies an exhibition held at the Münchner Stadtmuseum, Munich.

The accompanying CD-ROM includes Klenze's writings and other documents.

name: Klenze, Leo von
item_t: Leo von Klenze : Leben, Werk, Vision. [2. Aufl.]
author: Buttlar, Adrian von
public_note: This is a monograph and catalogue raisonné of Klenze's architectural projects. See also the first edition cited in this database.

name: Kliemann, Carl-Heinz
item_t: Die Graphik von Carl-Heinz Kliemann, Band I, 1946-1975.
public_note: Helga Kliemann edited the catalogue raisonné.  The catalogue lists all of the artist's graphic works in all media: woodcuts, intaglio prints, cards, lithographs, etc.

name: Klimsch, Fritz
item_t: Fritz Klimsch : eine Dokumentation.
author: Braun, Hermann
imprint: Cologne : Kunsthaus am Museum Carola van Ham, 1991.
ind_entr_cont: -Contains 26 photographs of artist's studio with notes
public_note: Provenance; Bibliog.; Comments

name: Kliemann, Carl-Heinz

author_s:
Kliemann, Carl-Heinz                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Kruse, Joachim                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Kliemann, Helga

Roters, Eberhard                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Kliemann, Helga                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Richter, Horst                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Börsch-Supan, Helmut                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Kruse, Joachim
public_note: The catalogue was issued with the cooperation of the Carl-Heinz and Helga-Kliemann Foundation.  The publication includes texts on Kliemann's portraits and self-portraits,  a discussion of his collages, and an essay on technique written by the artist.

name: Klimek, Harald-Alexande
item_t: Werkverzeichnis : Harald-Alexander Klimek 1959-2010.

Klimek, Harald-Alexander                                                            ;&nbsp

name: Kliemann, Carl-Heinz
item_t: Die Graphik von Carl-Heinz Kliemann, Band III 1991-1998.
public_note: Helga Kliemann edited the catalogue raisonné.

name: Kliemann, Carl-Heinz
item_t: Die Graphik von Carl-Heinz Kliemann, Band II, 1976-1991.
public_note: Helga Kliemann edited the catalogue raisonné.

name: Kirchner, Ernst Ludwig
item_t: Die Graphik Ernst Ludwig Kirchners. Band II: 1917-1927.
author: Schiefler, Gustav
public_note: Published in a limited edition of 620 copies, with numerous original woodcuts, 6 of which are in color.

name: Kisling, Moïse
item_t: Kisling : 1891-1953. [Tome IV]
public_note: The catalogue raisonné itself gives number, title, medium, provenance (with some public sale information), but no critical comments. There are errata notices for Tome I (first & second editions), Tome II, and Tome III.

name: Kisling, Moïse
item_t: Kisling : 1891-1953. [Tome I]

name: Kisling, Moïse
item_t: Kisling : 1891-1953. [Tome II]

name: Kisling, Moïse
item_t: Kisling : 1891-1953. [Tome III]
public_note: This constitutes the third volume of the catalogue raisonné, and includes corrections from the first and second volumes.

name: Kipniss, Robe
item_t: Robert Kipniss : Intaglios, 1982-2004.
author_s:
Piché, Thomas                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Kipniss, Robert                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Grace, Trudie A. (intro)
imprint: New York : Hudson Hills Press; [Lanham, MD] : Distributed in the US by National Book Network, 2004.
public_note: Catalogue is chiefly illustrations of 139 intagio prints, mezzotints, etchings, roulette prints and drypoints produced by the artist before March 2004. The catalogue only illustrates works housed in major public collections.

name: Kirchner, Ernst Ludwig
item_t: E. L. Kirchner : Das graphische Werk.
illustrations: profusely illustrated in b&w and color
public_note: First edition of the catalogue (see also later 1980 edition, cited in this database).

name: Kirchner, Ernst Ludwig
item_t: Die Graphik Ernst Ludwig Kirchners bis 1924. Band I: bis 1916.
author: Schiefler, Gustav
public_note: Published in a limited edition of 620 copies.

name: Kirchner, Ernst Ludwig
item_t: E. L. Kirchner : Das graphische Werk.
public_note:
This is a revised reprint of the authors' 1967 catalogue raisonné. The new edition includes all of the artist's woodcuts, etchings, and lithographs.

The introductory texts include biographical details and signature information. The texts are followed by the catalogue raisonné, organized by medium: woodcuts, etchings, lithographs. Each of the three sections provides catalogue number, title, date, dimensions, edition information, and collection location (if known).  There are indices and a concordance to Schiefler and Dube.

name: Kirchner, Ernst Ludwig
item_t: Ernst Ludwig Kirchner : die Skizzenbücher : 'Ekstase des ersten Sehens' : Monographie und Werkverzeichnis.
public_note: This study of the artist's sketchbooks is organized by subject: still-lifes, nudes, etc. There are concordances to other major books on the artist's works (Gordon on the paintings and Dube's three studies of the graphic works- see entries in this database); plus facsimiles of some of the handwritten text pages. In addition, there is a postscript, bibliography, and index of names.

name: Kirchner, Ernst Ludwig
item_t: Ernst Ludwig Kirchner.
author: Gordon, Donald E.
public_note: A catalogue raisonné of the paintings, listing over 1000 works (many of which are no longer extant). The publication also includes extensive documentary material.

name: Key, Willem
item_t: Willem Key (1516-1568) : Portrait of a Humanist Painter : With an Appendix to the Oeuvre of Adriaen Thomasz. Key.
public_note: From the series "Pictura Nova". A monograph and catalogue raisonné.  The publication contains an appendix of works by Adriaen Thomasz. Key (1545-1589) that have been discovered since publication of the author's 2007 catalogue raisonné (see entry cited in this database).

name: Keuninck, Kerstiaen de
item_t: Kerstiaen de Keuninck, 1560-1633 : de schilderijen met catalogue raisonné.
author: Devisscher, Hans
public_note: The study is divided into three sections: signed works, unsigned works, and works cited in the literature or in exhibition catalogues. The catalogue is in Dutch with German and English summaries.

name: Khnopff, Fernand
item_t: Fernand Khnopff : catalogue de l'oeuvre.
author_s:
Delevoy, Robert L.                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Croës, Catherine de                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Ollinger-Zinque, Giselle
public_note: This second revised and augmented catalogue includes information secured after the completion of the original 1979 publication.  The new edition includes updates information on collections, exhibitions, and bibliographical citations.  There is also an addendum for unlocated works.

name: Khnopff, Fernand
item_t: Fernand Khnopff : catalogue raisonné des estampes et des platinotypes rehaussés = ouevrecatalogus van de prenten en de gehoogde platinadrukken = Catalogue Raisonné of the Prins and the Enhanced Platinotypes.
author: Tricot, Xavier
public_note: Published on the occasion of a retrospective exhibition held at the Musée du Petit Palais, Paris, 2018-2019.  The parallel texts are in  French, Dutch and English

name: Ket, Dick
author: Gruyter, William Josiah de
public_note:
Catalogue of an exhibition held at the Gemeentemuseum Arnhem. 
See also the later 1994 exhibition catalogue cum catalogue raisonné, cited in this database.

name: Ket, Dick
item_t: Dick Ket : over zijn leven, ideeën en kunst.
public_note: Published on the occasion of an exhibition at the Gemeentemuseum, Arnhem 1994.

name: Key, Adriaen Thomasz
item_t: Adriaen Thomasz. Key (ca. 1545-1589). Portrait of a Calvinist Painter.
author: Konckheere, Koenraad
public_note:
From the series "Pictura nova." This is a monograph and catalogue raisonné of the artist's paintings and chiaroscuro prints.  The catalogue raisonné is divided into: autograph works, problematic attributions, lost and untraceable works, and rejected attributions.

Addenda to the catalogue raisonné are found in the appendix of the author's 2011 monograph and catalogue raisonné of the artist Willem Key (see entry cited in this database). The addenda adds 19 autograph paintings, all illustrated, and 2 problematic attributions to Adriaen Thomasz. Key.

name: Kim Hwan-g
item_t: Kim Whanki : Life and Work.
author: Kim, Wyang-an
public_note:
The catalogue was published in conjunction with the opening of the Whanki Museum in Seoul. The author was the artist's widow.  
The artist's complete works are presented, organized by period and location: New York 1963-1974; Tokyo 1933-1938; Paris 1951-1953; Pusan 1951-1953; Seoul 1940-1956 & 1959-1953.

name: Kim, Ki-ch'ang
item_t: Unbo Kim Ki-ch'ang : chonjak torok = Catalogue Raisonné Un-bo, Kim Ki-chang.
author: Kim, Ki-ch'ang
public_note: This is a 5 volume catalogue raisonné of the artist's entire output.  The publication lists approximately 4,000 authentic works by the artist.

name: Kirchner, Ernst Ludwig
item_t: Die Plastik Ernst Ludwig Kirchners : Monographie mit Werkverzeichnis.
author: Henze, Wolfgang
public_note: Issued on the occasion of an exhibition at the Kirchner Museum Davois (2002) and the Staatsgalerie Stuttgart (2003).

name: Kirchner, Ernst Ludwig
item_t: Ernst Ludwig Kirchner : das fotografische Werk.
author: Scotti, Roland
public_note: Covers the artist's important photographic work from 1908-1938.

name: Kirchner, Ernst Ludwig

author_s:
Stutzer, Beat                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Kornfeld, Eberhard W.                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Flury-Lemberg, Mechthild                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Liedtke, Kristina
public_note: This is a catalogue raisonné Kirchner's tapestry designs, published in conjunction with an exhibition held at the Bünder Kunstmuseum Chur.

name: King, Charles Bird
item_t: The Paintings of Charles Bird King (1785-1862).
author_s:
Cosentino, Andrew J.                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Taylor, Joshua C. (foreword)
public_note: Published for the National Collection of Fine Arts by the Smithsonian in conjunction with a 1978 exhibition.

name: Kippenberger, Martin

author_s:
Kippenberger, Martin                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Capitain, Gisela                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Grässlin, Karola
public_note: Published on the occasion of a 2003 circulating exhibition held at the Kunstverein Braunschweig and the Museum van Hedendaagse Kunst Antwerpen, Antwerp, which covered the artist's first complete production of multiples.

name: Kirchner, Ernst Ludwig

author: Gercken, Günther

public_note: The catalogue raisonné is a re-edition of the catalogues of Kirchner's prints by Gustav Schiefler and Annemarie & Wolf-Dieter Dube (See entries cited in this database).

Koch, Uwe                                                            ;&nbsp

name: Kippenberger, Martin

item_t: Jan van Kessel der Ältere, 1626-1679. Jan van Kessel der Jüngere, 1654-1708. Jan van Kessel der Andere, ca. 1620-ca. 1661 : kritische Kataloge der Gemälde.

name: Kerschbaumer, Anton
item_t: Anton Kerschbaumer, 1885-1931.
public_note: Following introductory material including an essay, biography, diary excerpts, and plates, there is a catalogue of the works organized in sections by various media (paintings, watercolors and gouaches, drawings, lithographs).  There is also a list of unauthorized works.

name: Kessel, Jan van
item_t: Jan van Kessel (1641-1680).
author: Davies, Alice I.
public_note: The appendices include lists of collections and names, a general index, a list of illustrations, and comparative figures.

name: Kelly, Ellsworth
item_t: Ellsworth Kelly : Sculpture.
author_s:
Sims, Patterson                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Pulitzer, Emily                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Armstrong, Tom (Foreword)
imprint: New York : Whitney Museum of American Art, 1982.
public_note: Published in conjuction with an exhibition held at: The Whitney Museum and the St. Louis Art Museum.  The catalogue lists all of Kelly's wood and metal reliefs, as well as freestanding figures executed from October 1949 to September 1982.

name: Kelly, Ellsworth
item_t: The Prints of Ellsworth Kelly, 1949-1985 : A Catalogue Raisonné.
author_s:
Axsom, Richard H.                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Floyd, Phylis                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Smoot, Myrna (Foreword)
imprint: New York  : Hudson Hills Press in association with the American Federation of Arts, 1987.
public_note: Dates are determined by the time the work first was conceived by the artist, drawn in his workshop, completed or published. Documentation comes from consultations with the artist, publishers, or printers, and titles are as applied by the artist (variants in parenthesis).  Additional information is given on medium, dimensions, signatures, print sequence, proofs, publishers, and comments.

name: Kentridge, William
item_t: The Juvenilia of William Kentridge : An Unauthorized Catalogue Raisonné
author:
Cole, William
Cole, William
imprint: Sitges : Caledonian Science Press for Cole & Contreras, 2016.
illustrations: 58 full-page color plates; some color ills.
public_note: The catalogue raisonné covers the artist's works in all media from 1962-1971.  The 53 works listed in the catalogue are illustrated in color.

name: Keller, Ferdinand
item_t: Ferdinand Keller (1842-1922) : Leben und Werk.
author: Koch, Michael

name: Kelly, Daniel

                                                            Goodall, Hollis (intro.)
imprint: Tokyo ; New York : Kodansha International : Kodansha America, 201l.

name: Kat, Otto Boudewijn de

public_note: check_needed

name: Kaufmann, Robe

public_note: All known works are included.

name: Keil, Bernhard

name: Kelly, Ellsworth

Bois, Yve-Alain                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Cowart, Jack                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Pacquement, Alfred
imprint: Paris : Galerie nationale du Jeu de Paume, 1992.
public_note:
Catalogue of a circuating exhibition held at the Galerie nationale du jeu de paume, Paris; the Westfaelisches Landesmuseum, Munster; and the National Gallery, Washington.

This study includes paintings, reliefs, and works that were begun in Euroope but finished after the artist's return to America in 1954.

name: Kaus, Max
item_t: Max Kaus : Werkverzeichnis der Gemälde.
public_note: The catalogue is chiefly illustrations, and was compiled in cooperation with the artist's widow.

name: Katz, Alex
item_t: Alex Katz : The Complete Prints.
author: Maravell, Nicholas P.
imprint: New York : Alpine Fine Arts Collection, Ltd., 1983.
public_note: The publication includes a biographical essay and an interview with Alex Katz by Carter Ratcliff.

name: Katz, Alex
item_t: Alex Katz, Prints : Catalogue Raisonné, 1947-2011.
author_s:
Schröder, Klaus                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Mautner Markhof, Marietta                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Bauer, Gunhild
public_note: The catalogue raisonné contains an interview with the artist. Works completed after June 2011 are listed in the supplement to the catalogue raisonné available at www.alexkatz.com.

name: Karsch, Joachim
item_t: Joachim Karsch : Werkverzeichnis der Plastiken.
author: Karsch, Florian
imprint: Weimar : VDG, Verlag und Datenbank für Geisteswissenschaften, 2005.

name: Kaus, Max
item_t: Max Kaus : Werkverzeichnis der Druckgrafik.
author_s:
Krause, Markus                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Schmidt, Martin                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Buchheim, Lothar Gúnther
illustrations: 380 mostly color ills., some color plates
public_note: The introductory texts include essays on Kaus's graphic works and a brief biography of the artist. The catalogue raisonné lists all of the artist's woodcuts, lithographs, screen prints, and etchings.  This is followed by an essay by Buchheim on Kaus' early lithographic work.

name: Kent, Rockwell
item_t: The Prints of Rockwell Kent : Catalogue Raisonné.
public_note:
See also the revised edition reprinted by Alan Wofsy, with updates by Robert Rightmire, 2002
(cited in this database).

The Appendices list 22 small wood engravings, prints patterns, and designs for cloth, as well as prints drawn by Kent but not cut by him. There also are lists of color prints, variant titles, and a chronology. The bibliography includes books illustrated with original prints or reproduced from his work, and publications by the artist.

name: Kent, Rockwell
item_t: The Prints of Rockwell Kent : Catalogue Raisonné.
author_s:
Jones, Dan Burne                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Rightmire, Robert                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Zigrosser, Carl (intro.)
imprint: San Francisco : Alan Wofsy Fine Arts, 2002.
public_note:
Originally published in 1975, this is a second edition revised by Robert Rightmire. 

The present volumes includes the author's text entries, an updated and expanded bibliography, an updated exhibition list, and 5 newly discovered works.

name: Kelly, Ellsworth
item_t: Ellsworth Kelly : Catalogue Raisonné of Paintings, Reliefs and Sculpture.
author: Bois, Yve-Alain
public_note: Entries includes catalogue number, title, place(s) and date(s), medium, dimensions, signatures/inscriptions, Kelly's inventory number, provenance (omitted when an item is owned by the artist), and exhibitions. There are also long critical comments and technical notes.

name: Karsch, Joachim
item_t: Joachim Karsch : Werkverzeichnis der Zeichnungen.
author: Karsch, Florian
imprint: Weimar : VDG, Verlag und Datenbank für Geisteswissenschaften, 2011.
public_note: Entries provide title with catalogue number, place, date, medium, dimensions, notes, collection information, references, and inscriptions.

name: Karsch, Joachim
item_t: Joachim Karsch : Werkverzeichnis der Graphiken.
author: Karsch, Florian
imprint: Weimer : VDG, Verlag und Datenbank für Geisteswissenschaften, 2006.
ind_entr_cont: There are additonal listings with exhibition information, publications reproducing the work, and museum collection holdings.
public_note: Exhib. Hist; Bibliog.; Comments

name: Kelly, Ellsworth
item_t: The Prints of Ellsworth Kelly : A Catalogue Raisonné.
author: Axsom, Richard H.
public_note: The catalogue was published to coincide with the "Ellsworth Kelly: Prints and Paintings" exhibition held at the Los Angeles County Museum.

name: Kent, Rockwell
item_t: Vital Passage : The Newfoundland Epic of Rockwell Kent : With a Catalogue Raisonné of Kent's Newfoundland Works.
imprint: St. John's, NL : The Rooms Corporation of Newfoundland and Labrador, 2014.
public_note: There is also a separate section with reproductions and drawings that were not listed  in the catalogue. Not all works are illustrated.

name: Kern, Anton
item_t: Anton Kern, 1708-1747.
author: Zlatohlávek, Martin
public_note: This study has a foreword, a section on the artist's life and work, and a catalogue raisonné covering the paintings, drawings, and engraving, plus mention of copies made after Pittoni and after the artist, and refuted attributions.

name: Kemmer, Johann
item_t: Hans Kemmer: ein Lübecker Maler der Reformationszeit.
public_note: The publication is adapted from the author's 1996 doctoral dissertation (Universität Heidelberg).

name: Kaplicky, Jan
item_t: Jan Kaplický Drawings.
author_s:
Jenkins, David (ed.)                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Rogers, Richard                                                            ;&nbsp
                                                            Margolius, Ivan
